⊢ (c0 ∈ Hil ↔(c0 ∈ PreHil ∧ dom(c1)= c2))

comment: The predicate "is a Hilbert space" (over a *-division ring). A Hilbert space is a pre-Hilbert space such that all closed subspaces have a projection decomposition. (Contributed by NM, 7-Oct-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
